page.title: 15FACILITIES
page.content: FACILITIES {FUEL: Of the people interviewed { 4 use oil, { 3 use coal fires, { 2 use electrical power, { 2 use solid fuel, { 1 uses coal storage heating, { 1 uses calor gas(there is no { main gas supply to { this area). } {GARAGE SUPPLIES:There is no garage in {Upton so the people rely on outside {sources.They all obtain their petrol {locally. } {2 buy petrol from Bretton, { Others are not specific but buy { from Peterborough,Bretton, { Stamford,Barnack,Wansford, { and Castor. { As for repairs to vehicles { 4 use Stamford garages, { 2 use Peterborough garages,
